textBeforeTable: Z Y W V U T S R Q P O N M L K I H G F E D C B A The list is alphabetized by title. Click on the appropriate tab to locate the desired record. Titles beginning with "Sefer" are listed separately in the second table below. The Judaica Collection's 16th-century Hebrew imprint holdings housed in the Beinecke Rare Books and Manuscripts Library. Each citation includes the title, author, place of publication, year of publication, and call number. Most of these call numbers are in the old Yale class system. Should you have any problems locating any materials, please notify Nanette Stahl, Curator of the Judaica Collection. ibrary L einecke B the at mprints I ebrew H entury C th 16 Contact Us Judaica Collection Blog Judaica Collection Curator
